titleInfo.title: Brothers and Sisters Rise of Southern Rock at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum (signed)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on brown) announcing the Brothers and Sisters: Rise of Southern Rock series with Bonnie Bramlett, Charlie Daniels, Mike Hyland and Ed King at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 29. Poster is signed by artists.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
